verses.roman:
śrīvāsa kahena,-kene kaha viparīta
kṛpā-mūlye cāri bhāi ha-i tomāra krīta

synonyms: śrīvāsa kahena—Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura replied; kene—why; kaha viparīta—do You speak just the opposite; kṛpā-mūlye—by the price of Your mercy; cāri bhāi—we four brothers; ha-i—become; tomāra—of You; krīta—purchased.
translation: Śrīvāsa then replied to the Lord, "Why are You speaking in a contradictory way? Rather, we four brothers have been purchased by Your mercy."
